content: They recently added a "refine" button, that, together with the save and compare option, takes up half of the screen and hides the search results. There doesn't seem to be an option to hide these screen-hijacks and it is immensely frustrating because they are REALLY in the way. It doesn't add any functionality, in fact, it reduces functionality. It is so bad it makes me avoid using the app altogether.

Buggy POS app. Images of products aren't viewable 98% of the time in the app. Touch feedback is garbage. Have to tap several times to view things like descriptions or photos of a product (most of the time they come up as photo unavailable). Very frustrating, this app is just as bad as Amazon's customer service and makes primes cost seem even more ridiculous.

App has always been great. (Had it for numerous years) Recently it is really buggy. Wishlist doesn't always show on the bottom of app. Delivery tracking shows up a blank screen (I have to exit delivery tracking page and re enter to see this information correctly). The option menu (3 horizontal lines top left) when pressed brings the menu up on the screen about 2cm from the left edge of screen (doesn't look right). Not the best at the moment. But I freaking love Amazon so...

Shows items that are not available for shipping to Canada and puts them in cart before finally letting you know they're not available when you're checking out. Also very deceitful about the final price of said items. You get hit with surprise shipping and import fees seemingly randomly, but once again only at checkout once you've spent all that time choosing your items. Extremely frustrating app. The old version was much better.

Good app, but it's got a tendency to crashed repeatedly. Between 2 and 5 seconds of opening the app. It says "oops sorry, something's gone wrong on our end" with a button to redirect you to the homepage. Once I press it, the app shows me the same thing once again within seconds. Please fix this. Great app otherwise.

Sometimes there's multiple listings for the same product but the descriptions are different. Can be very frustrating when you're looking for something very specific. Another suggestion would be to have the option of having anything made in the USA, or any country you desire, have like a flag emoji or symbol like "amazons choice" in or above the products name. Would save a lot of time looking through descriptions.

I love Amazon as much as the next person but this app is simply inoperable. I don't know if anyone else has this problem but the app crashes EVERY 5 MINUTES. I can't scroll through any page without it lagging, freezing and crashing. Even worse is when it freezes and disables my phone from closing and restarting the app, all the buttons stop working. Please fix this.

I love Amazon, and I used to love this app, but in the last month or so they have made changes that make it very user unfriendly! The add to cart button doesn't work, the search history doesn't work, hell most of the time I can't even get the app to load. That's a lot of money that Amazon is loosing from me. I used to pretty much do all my shopping there, now I go elsewhere. Probably going to cancel my Prime membership.

Too glitchy. In the shopping/wish lists, when I'm browsing for a specific list i.e. babies or groceries, it will suddenly glitch and switch to another list so my stuff either goes on the wrong thing or it doesn't go on at all! And there is no item limit warning for the lists. It will just delete stuff off until it's back under the item limit!

For the last few months or so the app has just been getting worse. It used to be great, now it just crashes or sits idle and not responding whilst sat on a blank screen, this needs fixing as it's currently unusable. I have had no such issues with other apps and have updated the app, but this still happens.

Great app, but even though you activate the alerts that your package(s) have arrived, you don't get a notification until quite a few hours later. This is really bad considering I only have THREE times that I can pick up my package(s) and they are all during my college classes. I would love to get a notification when my package arrives so I don't have to worry about someone stealing it!!!!!

This app for android SUCKS BALLS. It syncs the kindle app and the prime video app together. So when I want to log in on my husband's acct on prime video, it changes my login stuff for the shopping and kindle app. The ONLY way to change accts on the shopping app is to uninstall and then re-install. Somebody needs to fix this mess. It's irritating!!!!! I've had to do this MULTIPLE times.

I only gave this app 3 stars because of the movies and music. The actual shopping part is terrible. What's the point of paying to have 2 day shipping when nothing actually comes within the 2 days. Im not paying for 4 days im pay 12.99 for 2. They disappoint every time. If you can't guarantee 2 day shipping for all prime items don't say that you can.

The app used to work great and the wish list bar feature was cool when I updated it last time, but when I updated it this time it screwed everything up. My wish lists are gone, my shopping list is gone, everything is basically reset like I never had an account in the first place. It also deleted my prime membership & I cant see any of my old orders or anything.

There is no point in using the Amazon app over simply accessing Amazon in a browser. Too many permissions. Runs in the background all of the time, and eats up a ton of storage space. Plus, if you're using a browser with adblock, it's a lot faster to use Amazon that way than through the app.

The app isn't bad at all. Notifications let you know when items are dispatched, out for delivery or how many stops away the driver is. What is annoying is the app keeps asking me to update then offer no update. I pay for prime and prime used to be next day, now I purchase an item on prime that says get this next day delivery. Apparently ordering something on a Monday with prime next day delivery amazon states the item arrives 3 days later. Nice one amazon, this happens a lot. Bye bye prime.

Really terrible app for users from Ireland. You can filter the search for items eligible for international shipping and still half the products are not available to be shipped to Ireland. What's the point in filtering the results??? It truely excels at useless tasks like creating notifications to tell me I've never purchased a book from Amazon. The devs behind this app truely are visionaries in creating exactly what the customer does not need.

I think the app does what it says and shows a good representation of the website in terms of functionality and design. However, the app runs very slowly on my phone, and it became apparent that the app merely a web browser for the mobile website. Please build a native app for android.

Amazon had a great working app until this last update and now it's terrible. I used to be able to search for car parts and have the app show parts for only my car. Now it can't do that. It's now useless to go browsing through a specific category looking for the part i need cause it now shows me parts for all cars.

The app is very deceiving. As soon as I opened the app, it automatically signed me up for Amazon pime. I had to go in the settings and cancel my membership though I didn't even want Amazon prime to begin with. I thought it would let me shop in peace, but nope they immediately wanna charge me $13 per month when I open the app.

Honestly I'm very disappointed. The system on amazon is horrendous, the sellers don't provide proper photos, the buyer reviews are weird, or petty complaints like "oh I didn't get anything rare in this pokemon box except the promo" yeah that's be cause the packs don't guarantee good pulls, so stop giving these sellers a bad name. Also thanks to my issue with being made to pay for the US prime for three months when I'm a UK buyer, I'm not even going to consider using this app again once I get my refund.

Amazon is a great company (in theory). When it comes to brass tacks, thier execution is pure, unadulterated, proverbial garbage. Yeah, it may only be a few late or missing items, but it is the principal. IF YOU HAVE NO PROBLEM CHARGING ME MONTHLY FOR PRIME, AND I PAY IT, THEN THE EXECUTION ON DELIVERY IS REQUIRED. NO EXECPTIONS.

I recently purchase a product on the mobile app and the price in my cart was not updated.  Turns out they do not provide price match for a bug like this. So I was force to either return the product or keep the item which I had purchased at a price higher than the one shown in my cart.

Can no longer log in to Amazon apps. Neither main app nor Amazon Music allow me to sign in as do not recognise the email associated with my well established Amazon account. Renders both useless. When I clicked on.the login issues link with the preference to email customer service I was directed to log in to continue. So that's good....

Since two updates ago the app can't render special/daily offers page. Clearing cache and data does not help. Reinstall does not help. Thank you for disabling me from making purchases on the fly and saving me a lot of money. Amazon will thank you for preventing me purchasing stuff I don't need anyway. Cheers :)

The pictures when viewing an item don't load properly. Clicking on an image to make it larger just leaves a spinner and no picture. Occasionally it loads. Functionality wise the website works better, more natural flow with back button etc...

Have used this app. on the same phone for months but over the last week or two it continues to say app has stopped working when attempting to use the search section. Everything is up to date and I have uninstalled and reinstalled. Still not working. Love the app when it worked properly

The only issue I have have is that I keep getting "Amazon has unexpectedly closed" error notifications popping up...... Even when the app isn't even open. It's all the bloody time, and it's really pissing me off. Sort it out amazon!!!
It will not open once it has updated, I've tried multiple times and it goes to open but then brings me back to my home screen. So annoying. This happened since the last few updates

What an awful company to buy from. Froze my prime account for 4 weeks after receiving an email saying they would be in contact within 24hrs then charged me for a new subscription of ¬£80 when the account was still frozen!! The service number they give you to call could not help me at all because it's the "accounts" department problem, and they can not transfer the call or even get in contact with them other then "they" could email them on your behalf only. Finally the account was unfrozen with still no contact from Amazon. I closed the account and and will campaign against anyone wanting to use them. Just have a quick look at where they get there cheap labour from... there is even a #Vice documentary on how bad the company is. Your supporting slave labour shopping with Amazon.
Great app for Amazon, but I have not been able to use it in months. Everytime I open it it comes up with the "uh oh" message. Tried every fix I could find and still wont work.

Last few updates have made the application buggy and prone to freezing. One lockup was bad enough that I had to restart my phone. The updates have also introduced serious delays in scrolling to the bottom of product pages.

Prime Member, but for nearly a year, this app keeps freezing, giving blank white screens, crashing, & not allowing me to complete an order. Not enjoyable anymore. I just renewed my membership; thinking of canceling.

I like this app in terms of shopping. It is easy to find what you really and the user reviews (when legit) are great. So you hey be wondering why I marked it down...ads. Why, when your company is valued over a trillion bucks and the richest person in history, you have to put ads in your app is beyond me. It just goes to show the greed of Jeff Bezos knows no limits.

Always have bugs!! Cant view photos by making it larger by tapping them. It never loads! Sometimes i cant even choose different size or color because the app wont let me click. Fix the damn bugs!! You are the biggest online market. What's up with this bugs? Omg

This would be a great app if it would not keep you signed in. My daughter has her own money and her own Amazon account. At one time you could sign out in settings. Now if you stay signed in for any length of time, that option disappears. So to change accounts I have to uninstall the app and then reinstall it.

App keeps closing . Ive looked for a update and there is none, its draining battery with constant popups "amazon shopping keeps stopping". my phone tried to disable app but still getting pop ups every few seconds

I absolutely love Amazon! My only complaint would be that there is no option to hide things you have purchased under the "my orders" tab. I say that because I have friends ask me all the time "what do you even buy on Amazon?" I'd love to be able to show them without exposing some of my more personal orders.

They failed to deliver my package on time, plus I really don't know where is now my package. They should have called me if ever there's a conflict with the shipping address of my package. I am extremely disappointed by how expensive the fee was and didn't get the deal that was made. What's the point of paying for AmazonGlobal Priority Shipping that would only take for about 2 to 5 days and still haven't receive my package on time? And since they deliver my package too late, our business operation is now closed. So my only concern was, where did they left my package? Since they don't leave any notice about delivering it today way too early?

Shopping opportunities are of course amazing but security is terrible: there is no password option in making a purchase. So if you lose your phone (or your kids simply hijack it!), anyone can buy stuff without hindrance

This app has all the bells and whistles. 1 BIG problem. It came built in to phone, I didnt set it up, only accesses the account built in. It wont access the account I set up online at different device.
Your app has crashed 10x over the last week, and I suspect is what is causing both my Android devices to turn into slugs. Images aren't displaying on searches either.

Prime membership is so üíØ worth it not only do you get free 2 day shipping but also prime app for streaming movies TV shows new movies everything. It's my favorite and you can buy anything even groceries even set recurring deliveries for household items t.p. soaps food Staples you name it. Perfection. The bomb y'all!!!!!
Checkout does NOT work! Every time I try to buy something, I get stuck at a loading screen while trying to select my payment type or my shipping address. Defeats the whole purpose of this app.

I have been downloading ebooks and had collected quite a library including unread books for future reading. I just wanted to change my Email address with Amazon. As a result I have lost all my history.
I don't know what's going on, but images loading in the search list never work on my 5G wifi band. Absolutely annoying having to constantly go to my 2.4G or just mobile data to use the app.

The app always takes me to amazons home screen if I'm viewing an item but hit my home screen to check a text or something then go back into it. Customer service said uninstall and reinstall but did not fix

I will not recommend Amazon to anyone! They put my account on freeze for 3 weeks after saying someone would get in touch with in 24hours I phoned in 4 time myself trying to get the account sorted and they were not able to do anything because it is a "different" department that handles those problems, I asked to be transferred to that department and they said they do not take phone calls. In that time they charged me for a new Amazon prime membership for an account I had no access to. What a joke of a company. They do not care for you at all they just want your money!

I have the galaxy note 8 the app doesn't allow me to order. I have tried it on 4 other devices. I can't order unless I'm on my laptop. It's been close to a year that I have been able to just purchase from my phone.

I don't need a notification every day for a product that I do not want and would not buy. Thank you for abusing your notification privilege and identifying that I needed to uninstall your app. We'll just use the web-based service moving forward.

Not worth having the app in South Africa. First Item I ordered cost met about R500 3 weeks later I get notification that item is undeliverable. And no notification of when i can expect a refund. Even after Emails to the seller and courier.

Shopping on amazon has become one of my favorite things to do and this app makes that even more enjoyable. There's a great amount of time for returns on whatever it is you buy and refund is guaranteed. I jst looove this app!
Everything abt Amazon is gr8. One improvement I wish they had was if I could send the things in my cart over to some one else's cart without having to research again the things.
App is very buggy, cannot change my car when searching for parts. Menu slow to load, might as well use the website.

I have found this app to be absolutely amazing I love to shop I can find almost everything I need on this Amazon app the prices seem reasonable I'm disabled and can't get out so I have to rely on Amazon but I do price compared with other sites so I'm not making a big mistake when I back Amazon but I truly do like Amazon and I think the free shipping is fantastic

Every order I've placed recently has been late. Say it's supposed to arrive on a Tuesday, it won't even ship until that Tuesday. That and the rising cost of prime is getting a bit ridiculous. Once my current order arrives (a day late of course) I will be deleting
I really appreciate the stress-free shopping. & The logical design of this app! It really brings back the enjoyment of shopping on line!
It keeps crashing not letting me open the app! The only way 2 get round it if I want to carry on using Amazon App is to delete the app then reinstall it!! üò°
So far everything has been shipped well ahead of schedule using only free shipping. Very accurate delivery times, everything has been perfect.
Love my Amazon prime. The Prime might sound a bit pricey but if you hate shopping in stores as much as I do, it pays for itself in shipping and them some!!!
They make it impossible to sign out on newer phones. Spent 20 minutes on the phone for them to have to manual log out for me since the app did not have a log out button.
I have been a member about Amazon Prime for a year and 1/2 now now and I love the convenience of shopping and the products they carry are high quality at a good price. Thank you Amazon.

Prime membership has disappointed me this past year. I been given the wrong order, arived late 3 times. And their response is just sorry. Might start looking into buying online at Walmart now. 2 day shipping is free there.
So since the more recent updates your app runs super slow. I hope it gets better soon. because the ease of use is compromised by the slowness od the app.

The cart has a huge ad or something and the proceed to check out box won't move leaving me a slither of a view of what's in my cart. FIX THIS NOW. I spend too much time in this app to have to deal with this.
I've used Amazon for a long time and I've always been impressed with the service. Shipping rates went through the roof recently though so I don't use it very often anymore.
Such a limited app for no reason. Why can I not search by exact price range. Why can I not use price as a filter without selecting the department. Get your selves together
Can't seem to find out how to lock the app with a pin or password, seems like anyone who has my phone can buy, maybe I just missed the option.

So I pay for prime I ordered 2 things last Friday one was an MX helmet that was prime with 2 day shipping and the other was a hitch receiver for my SUV wish was standard shipping the receiver came in before the the helmet why do I need to pay for prime if it dose nothing I still haven't gotten the helmet it's still in Tennessee where it was shipped from last Saturday
I like that a person can easily find almost anything here at a great low price the shipping is free almost always and super fast!!
I'm having the same issues as other users have mentioned in their reviews. The images dont load and I have to view an item for it to show. Any suggestions?
I just updated the app and now it keeps crashing and I can't look at my orders individually. Using S9+
Application opening extremely slow on Samsung A5 2016. I can't explain how slow it is sometimes I am forgotten what I was looking for. Regards.
Very poor app takes a long time to show search results and lots of uh oh something went wrong on our end pop ups
Amazon is a good company but if you look at Target, Walmart and eBay you'll find the same items for less and they'll also ship it to you for free.

The thing I liked the most was the 20 percent discount on preorder games and that is what I purchased the most and now the discontinued that discount so the thing I purchased the most from here I will be purchasing from somewhere else now.
It's simply ridiculous that one of the most important IT company in the world uses a simple browser and a simple mobile site for its contents!
Come on. Disappointed to see a web based app for such a big company. Even look at the user interface. Looks like developed by a part time freelancer. Spend some money for a native app.
customer service great and give you youre money back on broken stuff shipped out poorly by delivery, etc. Amazon rocks! Ebay is good too, but i got screwed too many times on ebay.
Everyone knows that Amzon is the top online shopping experience I love this App above all. The only thing I dislike about Amazon, I have been playing the giveaways for a long time to never win ever
This app is amazing, it littarly has everything and makes clothes and book shopping easy. Heavily would recommend to the entire world
This is a great app that makes shopping online so much easier. I love the deal and in-stock notification alerts!
Someone took over account with a code generator to a phone that is not mine and amazon won't accept that. They keep sending me emails to reset my account and password which I know!!!

I ordered some things and they are coming on time like they said but I have a problem when I wanted to give a review they wanted to charge me that's a no no after I get all of the things I ordered I will not be using Amazon prime ever or the app
I am not happy with the catch of withdrawing monthly fee... I really don't even use it as much to be paying that membership monthly I will stick to Costco
This app crashed almost every time I tried using it. It was very slow when it did work.
I love Amazon and I love this app. If I ever have questions or concerns the customer service takes care of it with a great attitude.
One of the best shopping apps when it comes to selection and obviously, variability. ‚ò∫
I have galaxy s7 edge i search up something on amazon and its so slow...... not saying i have the best phone in the world but it shouldnt take so long to search something up
It's good, but it should have a little more stuff in general even stuff for antiques like auto parts, but great app I like it a lot anyway
Doesn't deliver products on time. Takes more than double the time. Sometimes doesn't even deliver.
Currently having issues using this app when I click a product its shows for a second then goes blank and says something went wrong
My 6 year old son ordered tons of items on here and I got the notifications from Amazon, customer service came through and corrected! No charge to My account!
It's always easy to shop for what we need, weather is school supplies, small electronics, phone accessories it's easy to use.

These money grubbing thieves will do anything to get you to join prime including easy accidental sign up pop ups. Then you immediately cancel and get to wait for the hassle of their terrible customer service refunding you
It worked at first, but now I can't access the app whenever I tap on the icon. If you can fix it, I might download it again.
Apple no longer let me search on my terms will not let me click the search button when I type something in will only search when I click on it pre-selected text

Amazon Is The ONLY Site\App I Use To Buyy ANYYHING. It Has Some Of THE BEST Products, If Youu Can Sift Thru All The Fake\Bad Listings. Other Than That, Its Myy Go-To Shopping Place!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
This app is ok I just wish they ship to jamaica at any home address or post office like they do in the state state but other than that it's ok.
9/24/18 unable to successfully use this app on my Google pixel. Once I get past the home screen glitches like crazy
I love the shopping app great stuff, and lots of other things, and very cheap too, great bargains as well fantastic üëç‚ù§
I love Amazon for things that are hard to find, and ridiculously priced at stores and malls.
I don't want or need this app, I disable it and it reappears a short time later. Intrusive BS....
Uh-oh something went wrong every 5 seconds making it impossible to use the app, why,WHY?! WHAT WENT WRONG????
I love Amazon shopping. It there, it's easy, it's quick. With this app, I haven't been to the mall in over two years. This is all I have to say for now.

I cant live without this app some folks go to local super stores i go to my Amazon app everything i need from a- z as a part time baker i find everything i need from food color to cake boxes even labels
AWESOME APP this app is really good what I love abt it is that when a kid wants to buy something it send me me a email and I can decline it or except it
Runs terrible and slow. Can't use anymore without it locking up my phone. Junk.
Uninstalling due to spam messages about offers for this that and the other. I will buy when i want to buy not when you think i should!
Sick of accidentally purchasing Kindle books when I am just trying to scroll/browse. Uninstalled all Amazon mobile apps because of this.
I'm not sure why I have 2 app buttons on my home screen, but only one in my playstore..? I sure would like to have the usable space rather than 2 of the same app
I love this app with the exception that I struggle with it opening when I click links from other apps.
Buggy buggy buggy. The mobile website is just as optimized and isn't nearly as buggy.
I ordered 3 things a month ago and still never got them because they would cancel my card then push the shipping date 2 to 3 days when it was suppose to be shipped to my houseüò°
Ordered quite a bit of stuff... everything i ordered was satisfactory. The convenience of this app is amazing.
Latest version has broke the app for me, the screen is just blank when there should be products listed.

Cheaper is not better and think of all the people who don't work as cashier's and in a store this site has no store and you can't look in person at what you are buying you have to trust a picture of the supposed item and return it when it is not your size and not what you even expected it to be üòüüòüüòü
The search for wedding registrys STILL doesnt work!! Its been over 6 months! Please fix

I have always loved Amazon and have been a prime member for years but as of lately all of the shipping days are now 5 and 6 days instead of 2 days why am I paying for Amazon prime if I have to wait a week for shipping
Paying way too much for prime Half the time items arrive late! Bad customer service. Too many problems Ending my prime account
Continually crashes. I'd Amazon app was seamless. Update didn't help.
Great app! Easy to maneuver about the site! Great deals! Definitely worth downloading!
Shocking since the update, no pictures will show its just lists of what you can buy.
I use Amazon for most of my shopping, however at the latest update causes the screen to freeze and the app to close on my phone
